casebody.data:
FEDERAL NATIONAL MORTGAGE ASSOCIATION (Fannie Mae), Respondent
v.
Antonello BOLDRINI, Petitioner No. 9 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 2, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 2nd day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Motion for Leave to Add a Party and to Stay All Matters on this Captioned Case 2016-3597 are DENIED.
